00025 void PropagatedSpike::ProcessEvent(Simulation * CurrentSimulation){
00026         
00027         Interconnection * inter = this->source->GetOutputConnectionAt(this->target);
00028         Neuron * neuron = inter->GetTarget();  // target of the spike
00029         neuron->ProcessInputSynapticActivity(this);
00030         
00031         CurrentSimulation->WritePotential(this->GetTime(), inter->GetTarget(), neuron->GetStateVarAt(1));
00032         //CurrentSimulation->WriteSpike(this);
00033         
00034         neuron->GenerateInputActivity(CurrentSimulation->GetQueue());
00035         
00036         this->source->PropagateOutputSpike(this, CurrentSimulation->GetQueue());
00037                     
00038     if(inter->GetWeightChange() != 0){
00039         inter->ChangeWeights(this->time);
00040     }
00041 }
